website_summaries.verdict: A gentle whey isolate protein powder that gives you all the benefits of traditional protein powder without any digestive discomfort.
pros: 25 grams of protein in a serving
Mixes well in water, juice or in smoothies
Won't upset your stomach if you're lactose-intolerant
cons: Some have complained about the taste and overall digestibility

customer_reviews.title: Great Lean Alternative To The Regular Formula
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the regular Syntha-6 blend for a while and my wife wanted to start using the same protein powder. I was glad to find this isolate version which is much leaner than the regular powder. Plus, summer is a great time to switch to this if you’d like to cut some cushion. Still has a great taste (almost sweeter maybe, hard to tell), consistency is still nice and thick like a shake, and the stuff just works! I always seem to rotate back to Syntha-6.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Pb cookie
customer_reviews.text: I bought the peanut butter cookie flavor. It tastes like a peanut butter cookie with a hint of the usual distinct protein shake flavor. Not the absolute best but I've certainly had far worse. Kind of a bland flavor which is good I suppose so you don't get sick of it quickly. I like to ad a heaping tablespoon of PB2 along with 10oz skim to improve the flavor a bit. I never mix protein in water because that's disgusting to me so I can not comment on how it tastes with water alone. The syntha 6 isolate doesn't taste as good as the regular syntha 6 of course but it's still way better than a lot of powders.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Quality protein
customer_reviews.text: In my option this is by far the best whey isolate I have tried from Amazon. Excellent taste and filling. You really get a good feeling after using this protein after a work out.
customer_reviews.author: Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Safety question
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really evaluate taste or versatility. Concerned that I need to toss the whole container without using any of the product. My container was sealed with plastic on the outside but the inside seal was not intact. Just opened the container but afraid to use the product. Not sure if it’s safe to consume. Any other powder I’ve purchased had a seal under the lid and completely sealed when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Pros It has a strong cocoa taste and overall decent taste. Cons Hard to mix May give you an upset stomach I’ve always gotten an upset stomach or gritty like taste in the shake. Personally didn’t like it, others love it.
customer_reviews.author: CurlyHeadDan

customer_reviews.title: Chalky and too thick
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened. I remember purchasing this protein years ago and it being really creamy and smooth. Not sure if the chocolate flavor is particularly bad, but this is up there w/ the worst protein I've ever had. I am not one to judge supplements off taste, I simply can't get this down (without watering down)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Osman

customer_reviews.title: I have always enjoyed and used SYNTHA 6 religiously because its a good ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always enjoyed and used SYNTHA 6 religiously because its a good product. Unfortunately the product sent to me was really hard to drink after mixing it with water. Maybe it's old or just a bad batch because after mixing it was really gritty and hard to drink. This is the first time I've ever experienced a problem with a BSN product.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha means goodbye..

customer_reviews.title: Great if tolerant
customer_reviews.text: Never tried a BSN product before but read they were delicious. This in fact is the most delicious protein shake I've ever had. Smooth, rich, and creamy. I've been mixing it with my morning oatmeal and nighttime plain greek yogurt for some extra flavor. However, this being my first casein protein shake, I'll never buy one again. This protein has really pulled the brakes on my digestive system. Really unpleasant. If you have lactose problems, or even might think you do (I'm susceptible but never quite like this), avoid this and all casien proteins. Not worth the hassle. For those unaffected, dig in!
customer_reviews.author: Holt

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Milk shake Great taste, low calories
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate Milk shake Great taste, low calories, high protein what else can you ask for. Not quite as good of a taste as the BSN Syntha-6 Edge or regular Syntha-6. I'd say 9/10 on a "Taste Scale". This product arrived quickly and was well packaged. No evidence of tampering. One of the staples in my numerous supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: One of the very best protein powders I have ever tried... and I have tried a LOT of brands!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D'Agostino

customer_reviews.title: If you wanna get jacked this is for you
customer_reviews.text: My husband is Jacked lol he loves this product. My kids love the taste
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protein isolate, been a BSN fan for years
customer_reviews.text: Works great, definitely performs like an isolate, flavor is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Maison Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of protein products, this and muscle milk are the best tasting hands down. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES F LUEDEMANN

customer_reviews.title: Favorite protein
customer_reviews.text: Easy to digest especially since I have a sensitive stomach. Taste is pretty good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a leaner replacement for my morning/nightly protein. I originally used muscle milk, then switched to ON casein, then to BSNTrue Mass. I founf the Syntha-6 design of having Whey and Casein mixed together to be a good blend and it is definitely tasty. I enjoyed the Chocolate flavor and it mixes really well. Definitely a good addition to your breakfast and pre-sleep meals.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Joy

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good product, though servings are a little lite for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Biggs

customer_reviews.title: 🤔
customer_reviews.text: So there is no option about speaking with the seller so i'll have to put my complain here. There was no scoop inside, and no seal under the lid. The taste the first time was granny but after mixxing more it becomes normal..
customer_reviews.author: tomas

customer_reviews.title: Like the taste
customer_reviews.text: This protein have a good taste and is really big, for the price, I thought maybe could be kinda small. Something I like is the instruction you ca not loose you in the amount you have to take.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Protein Supplement!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting protein supplement. Thick and creamy just like a real milkshake. I got the chocolate flavor Just 1 scoop (roughly 1/3 cup) has 25 grams of protein. Mix it with 8 ounces of milk for a total of 33 grams.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Yummy & high quality
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder tastes amazing in chocolate and vanilla. Decent macronutrient breakdown (wish it was lower in carbs and fat like other Isolates). Fast shipping & overall great product. My new favorite protein!
customer_reviews.author: Saul & Jaré

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! Low calorie but taste is AMAZING!!!!! Best stuff my husband and I have ever tried!!!!! Purchased in the past and will purchase again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: One of the better tasting protein shakes i have tried. easy on the stomach too, I've tried a few that messed with my plumbing and made me clear a room. I'm sure my girl friend is happy now that i switched to this.
customer_reviews.author: JayP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Buy this stuff! OMG, I lost a ton of weight, now sugar, high proten etc..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Powder
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein powder. I get it here because it's cheaper and it gets delivered right to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany St Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price :)
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of most BSN supplements, but AM a fan of Syntha-6 proteins! Pros: Taste is great like all syntha 6 proteins Has Nutritional facts (as opposed to supplemental facts) Price per serving for an Isolate protein 25g Protein + 11g BCAA per 38g scoop! (minimal fillers) Cons: Scooper was on bottom of jug (use a butter knife to get it up)
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin McGee

customer_reviews.title: This chocolate flavor is by far the best
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is delicious. BUY THIS. You wont be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: KarCam

customer_reviews.title: tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sceptical that this product could taste as good as the original Sytha-6. However, it delivered! I have tried various isolates in the past and they for the most part all tasted terrible, mixed poorly, and gave me gas. Syntha-6 didn't have any of these problems. Will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly, a bland chicken breast isn't so bad...
customer_reviews.text: It's good on paper. Good stats, but tastes awful... Drinking this always reminds me to not drink protein and to actually eat it instead. Suddenly, a bland chicken breast isn't so bad...
customer_reviews.author: Dararith Long

customer_reviews.title: Warranty / quality
customer_reviews.text: Missing warranty cover below cap so thats mean is not the original braind
customer_reviews.author: Abdellah Lafdi

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great. Mixes Easily.
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting chocolate isolate protein. I've always loved BSN's supplements and this one is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Winston V.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and is definitely a meal replacement. Why are these giant bottles only half full?
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Saint

customer_reviews.title: Great prodcut
customer_reviews.text: BSN products are the best. This stuff taste great and mixes very well. I like the isolate for the lower calorie count, but I use both.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Gault

customer_reviews.title: Taste pretty good in water
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good chocolatey taste in water. Kinda strong in a smoothie though. Not bad for 50$ though.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Halasa

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting
customer_reviews.text: Always have stayed away from chocolate because they can taste really bad, but this one is good.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein, just wish it had less sweeteners. Otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Grable

customer_reviews.title: ... time I've tried the ISOLATE mix and it tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've tried the ISOLATE mix and it tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: One of the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: The isolate form is phenomenal. Recommended for protein shakes with little affect on your caloric intake for the day. Quick recovery and taste is great.
customer_reviews.author: B. Prentice

customer_reviews.title: great taste and even curbed my appetite a little
customer_reviews.text: great taste and even curbed my appetite a little, been trying to lose weight and got fuller faster at dinner.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the results from this. And the taste is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fillingim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and gets the job done. I've noticed immediate results in my physical growth due to this product. I feel much better for the rest of the day after using the product post workout. I use it with milk and it tastes like a reasonably tasty (but not AMAZING) chocolate shake. If you use more than one scoop (I use 1.5 on heavy leg days) with milk in one of those Blender Bottles, then it will sometimes not completely dissolve leaving a gritty texture to the drink, but it still has a pleasant but not quite DELICIOUS taste I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Found a strand of hair inside the container. Definitely an issue that needs to be resolved and prevented.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate tastes grea
customer_reviews.text: great taste huge tub you can weigh it if you are in doubt about the actual weight
customer_reviews.author: Txbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protein
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting protein, supplier was fast with transaction and delivery, will order some more before I run out !
customer_reviews.author: yianniss2k

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, low in carbs and fat and awesome results
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: very chalky
customer_reviews.text: Very chalky tasting, be careful of the size you order. Start small as there is no refund. Buying the larger is more cost effective, but at the risk of not liking it dont take the chance. I got a realy bad allergic reaction from it, Such as terrible headache and severe stomach cramps, So buyer be ware! I have used other syntha products as well and never had thus reaction. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Irie Living

customer_reviews.title: A very satisfactory product.
customer_reviews.text: A very satisfactory product. Deuneyo feel the body becomes healthy.
customer_reviews.author: AHN JIN HWAN

customer_reviews.title: Taste could be better, but isn't all protein powders lacking in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality protein. Taste could be better, but isn't all protein powders lacking in the taste department??
customer_reviews.author: ManChild17

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste nearly as good as normal syntha 6 but has about 100 less ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't taste nearly as good as normal syntha 6 but has about 100 less calories per serving so I suppose that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: MIstah H

customer_reviews.title: Lightening Fast Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered one week ahead of schedule! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate tasted good. The only disapointing is that they only filled the bottle half full lol
customer_reviews.author: Kris Gabriel kiamco

customer_reviews.title: Spot on!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent taste chocolate milkshake! Is the vanilla very sweet? Anyone?
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible now. Had to send back two orders
customer_reviews.text: BSN must have changed the recipe for this powder. Tastes horrible now. Had to send back two orders.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Better than regular Syntha 6??!!
customer_reviews.text: 60 less calories per serving, 3 extra grams of protein per serving. Very little fat and a decent taste. Not quite as flavorful as the regular syntha 6, but if you take two servings per day that's 120 extra calories you don't have to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: gunmetalgreen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best protein on the market, taste great and does the job fulfilling your dietary needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was already opened
customer_reviews.text: BSN's Chocolate flavor is awesome as usual. My only complaint is that the bottle was already opened, so I lost about 1/4 of the whole product (4.01 lbs). A bit disappointed for that.
customer_reviews.author: Marte

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and add to cart
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't taste quite as good as normal Syntha-6, but it still tastes pretty good. Regular Syntha-6 tastes better than most other protein powders on the market. This protein tastes pretty good - still better than most, and has less calories and fat than most others. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Chalky and Gritty
customer_reviews.text: I really like Syntha-6 and so I thought that this product would be similar, except more protein with less calories than the Syntha-6. This protein powder is chalky, gritty, and has a terrible aftertaste. Even after "doctoring" it up with pudding mix and coffee, I still could not drink it. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sgrooms86

customer_reviews.title: Great rich flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Very great and rich flavor! It mixes easily even just in a shaker. My personal favorite is to blend it with 8 oz cold water, half a frozen banana and some ice cubes - it's like a delicious low calories milkshake!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Averhoff

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have used few other products before but this one is a lot better. I started this product 1 month back and have observed improvement in muscle recovery. No I don't feel as much soreness that I used to observe before.
customer_reviews.author: Vinay

customer_reviews.title: One of the best protein supplements I've had
customer_reviews.text: This product mixes extremely well and tastes great even when mixing with only water. I have tried many different protein supplements but this one has to be my favorite Isolate. You can't go wrong with Syntha-6 Isolate! Note: It is a little pricey but it's worth it in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Sandy texture!
customer_reviews.text: i got the chocolate milkshake and it has this weird sandy texture when I use my shaker bottle! Even after shaking very well!!
customer_reviews.author: omar

customer_reviews.title: Tastes way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Mixed with some almond milk and a little water in a Blender Bottle. Tastes way better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Isolate protein is definetly better quality but the taste of regular Syntha 6 is definetly better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First of all. There was no seal underneath the cap. That is a big no no. Second of all. The taste is absolutely no where near the same and the syntha 6 non isolate. The 60 extra calories is more worth it for the taste of the original. The isolate version does not taste very good at all. Maybe 2/10 for taste. I'll stick with the original.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L.

customer_reviews.title: Taste needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: BSN please improve the taste of the chocolate it tastes like windex smells. But I do like that you get 25 grams of protein and only 2 grams of fat. Make it taste like the chocolate matrix protein that's great but too much fat in that one.
customer_reviews.author: Mamahoneybadger

customer_reviews.title: Super Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting Isolate that I've had to date and mixes flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: identical looking container fooled eyes
customer_reviews.text: bought while on lightning deal, thought it was the regular syntha6. would take responsibility if the container didnt look virtually identical. the taste is frothy and not as good... my wife and i both dislike
customer_reviews.author: Nick 1983

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and tastes great. Extremely satisfied with results so far, I have only been taking it for 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Jason Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time and has been great ever since
customer_reviews.author: Nadun

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good although a little too sweet for my pallet, which I think is the Sucralose. I sometimes use it as a meal replacement shake (two scoops and a banana) when I can't make a proper lunch or dinner. It gives me a crazy energy boost about an hour later. Could be the sugar from the banana, but I wouldn't recommend drinking one before bed. I've also noticed less muscle soreness the day after a work out, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: matthew louis woolley

customer_reviews.title: great product...fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein. Great lean gains with little carbs and low calories for 25 grams of protein :) Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Edward Park

customer_reviews.title: Great taste at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The product helped build strength and tastes much better than other comparable products. However, BSN's isolate blend had more casein isolates than whey. Therefore, I would not recommend this product for immediate post-workout recovery. Casien isolates are however perfect for night time recovery. Overall the product tastes great and lived up to BSN standards.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Murcia

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the normal version
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally bought this instead of the regular version, which I must say was a big mistake. The chocolate tastes pretty bad and it's really chalky, which means it's tough to chug like I do with all of the rest. I'd strongly recommend not trying this, but instead get the normal one.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Drake

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes ok. Really expensive for what it is. Plain bulk isolate is flavorless and less than half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Drukawski

customer_reviews.title: Great protein
customer_reviews.text: I've used many different protein powders, but this is by far my favorite so far. It has a good blend of 25 grams of quality isolate protein per scoop. It's very lean 1.5 grams of fat, 7 grams of carbohydrates. It tastes amazing especially when mixed with milk.
customer_reviews.author: John Wise

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a 2nd chance
customer_reviews.text: So I wrote a 1 star review previously and felt like I should re-do it because I tweaked my intake of this product. Originally I took 2 scoops at a time which is what caused the intestinal issues. I gave it another go and only had 1 scoop of this, mixed with another protein powder so that my post workout shake would still be around 40-50g of protein. When I did that I had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vorn

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great - Low in Fat
customer_reviews.text: First off this protein tastes great. The entire Syntha 6 line tastes about as good as protein can, and at the same time dissolves very easily in water. For anyone seeking longer absorption times of protein (before bed, meal replacement), I can not recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: Flint McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no seal on the container and tastes a bit off
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Best Product
customer_reviews.text: I am 44 years old. I am a man. I've been working out for about 25 years. I have purchased protein shakes for about the same length of time. This product is the best tasting protein shake I've ever tried in chocolate. The other flavors or only okay, but the chocolate is the best tasting. It does not have an aftertaste. It does not make me feel lethargic and full. It's light, gives me my required protein intake, and tastes great. I'll probably use this for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Not the Syntha as before
customer_reviews.text: I have taken a few different powders from Syntha. This one is a real loser. Chalky texture was so unpleasant even when using a machine blender. This is not the same BSN I once knew. They had an ISO version a few years ago, couldnt find it anymore so tried this, mistake.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great breakfast!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this protein powder. The flavor is great and the consistency is smooth. I add a tbsp of dark chocolate cocoa powder and also 1/2cup of frozen blueberries or cherries with 8 oz of ff milk, wonderful drink!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E. Long

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Tastes Good, very much like Jell-O Chocolate Pudding Flavor. Speaking of pudding, it mixes thicker than non Isolate Syntha 6 and mixes very thick if you make it with almond milk. What I am saying here is that there is a noticeable texture. However It mixes smooth with no clumps in a shaker bottle with ball with either fluid. I am going to see how I feel when I am almost out about whether or not I go back to the 'regular' Syntha 6 due to the texture thing which is obviously a personal preference. All that being said, it's very good and I would recommend trying the Isolate type Syntha 6.
customer_reviews.author: Kamal HD

customer_reviews.title: Corn syrup
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realise it has corn syrup so have stopped buying which is a pity as it tastes great and works well
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, Not great
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd try and change it up from straight whey for a month. Didnt like the taste or consistency of this powder at all.
customer_reviews.author: G. Prout

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price, doesn't give me gas or have additives that make me bloated.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes great and has helped me build lean muscle mass. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: 80 casein and 20 whey % best taste ever
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting shake ever that said wish it was 50 50 blend, casein is cheap to buy dosent warrant expensive price for the powder the bottle says 80 20 blend when u get it
customer_reviews.author: CwCr52712

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Powder for muscle growth
customer_reviews.text: The powder tastes great mixed in water. Protein isolate is great, not filling, easily digested and absorbed for muscle growth
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE A MILLER

customer_reviews.title: best on market
customer_reviews.text: this stuff mixes well and does the job. great buy..
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: This is the best tasting chocolate protein powder on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting chocolate protein powder on the market. Every time I try a new brand I am seriously disappointed by the taste and wish that I had ordered Syntha. Right now I am drinking the MusclePharm Chocolate protein powder and I want to gag every time...... With Syntha you can't go wrong flavor wise and it is pretty much as lean as possible. Dont waste your money on other brands.
customer_reviews.author: HonestBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Syntha 6 is my go to Protein
customer_reviews.text: Syntha 6 is a great product with the best flavor
customer_reviews.author: Katie Krug

customer_reviews.title: WPI+Casien - Quality product with simple ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This is quality product. This is WPI+Casein and I think this will work for most people. I'm little bit sensitive on lactose but I didn't have any problem on this product. Price is also reasonable with Amazon's instant coupon,
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Too thick/chalky/sweet
customer_reviews.text: A little chalky and the taste is overpowering and thick per the recommended liquid. I've had to put several ounces more in each serving to choke it down. Not too bad that way. I'd stick to the non-isolate for this brand if taste and consistency is any consideration. Love BSN whey/casein products, just not the isolate.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hammitte

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste with milk
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best tasting protein powder that I've used, especially when mixed with milk (even skim). Usually the best tasting powders have the poorest nutrition stats but this product has pretty low carbs and fat as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tasted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews on its taste. They weren't wrong-it's the best tasting protein supplement I've had. It's still protein, so you can tell it's (very) slightly gritty and has that protein taste. Still though, super happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Purchased again!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a quality protein powder -- this is my second container to purchase in the past several months and I couldn't be happier. Great taste, my go-to recovery drink. As with most protein powders, I would recommend a shaker bottle to mix your drink to help break up the powder.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great price! Got this delivered very quickly with prime. Was a much better deal than Bodybuilding.com, whom I had been using for 12+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the standard syntha-6 this product does not taste quite as good. However it mixes better and most importantly it has a better nutritional profile. Specifically it has much lower cholesterol and fat. It still tastes good and imo is worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: The Captain

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes amazing!!! I used to make shakes with fruits to try and compensate for the taste. Now I do it because the fruit tastes better with the protein shake. Will be buying this again once I run out. Too bad they don't make this in Fillet Mignon favor.
customer_reviews.author: Don't You Wish

customer_reviews.title: Great tast and it works
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the best whey protein powder I've ever used. I'm not a bodybuilder or a professional fitness expert. However, I have been lifting and exercising for 13+ years, so I've tried many of the products out there. This speeds up my recovery as well as helps my muscles stary firm and shapely.
customer_reviews.author: Baron John

product_meta.title: BSN SYNTHA-6 ISOLATE Protein Powder, Whey Protein Isolate, Milk Protein Isolate, Flavor: Chocolate Milkshake, 48 servings
product_meta.description:
Flavor:Chocolate| Size:48 Servings

SYNTHA-6 ISOLATE is an ultra-premium protein powder consisting of a 50/50 blend of Whey Protein Isolate and Milk Protein Isolate. BSN’s unique ISOLAST protein matrix combines the advantages of both fast and slow digesting protein sources that have had much of the fat, sugar and other undesirable components ‘isolated’ out, making SYNTHA-6 ISOLATE the ideal post-workout recovery shake. SYNTHA-6 ISOLATE provides 25 grams of high-quality protein and the same delicious taste as SYNTHA-6, thanks to BSN's exclusive flavor technology.
feature_bullets: ISOLAST ISOLATE PROTEIN MATRIX –a matrix of fast and slow release proteins from whey protein isolate and milk protein isolate sources
11G EAAs PER SERVING – help refuel and build quality muscle mass
GREAT-TASTING – the delicious milkshake-like flavors you’ve been accustomed to drinking from BSN
MILKSHAKE CONSISTENCY – amazing texture and consistency
ANY-TIME FORMULA – great for in the morning, pre-workout, post-workout, between meals, or anytime where you need more protein in your diet

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
